org.chronos.common.configuration

Interface ChronosConfiguration

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractConfiguration, ChronosBuildConfigurationImpl

    public interface ChronosConfiguration
    This is the basic interface for all configuration classes in Chronos.

    The primary purpose of this interface (aside from acting as a base class) is to offer methods that convert the configuration into a variety of output formats, such as an Apache Commons Configuration object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.apache.commons.configuration.Configuration asCommonsConfiguration()
      Converts the contents of this configuration into an Apache Commons Configuration object.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> asMap()
      Converts the contents of this configuration into a regular java.util.

    • Method Detail

      • asCommonsConfiguration

        org.apache.commons.configuration.Configuration asCommonsConfiguration()
        Converts the contents of this configuration into an Apache Commons Configuration object.

        The returned object will receive a copy of the internal values, therefore any modifications to the returned configuration will have no impact on the internal state, and vice versa.

        Returns:
        The Apache Commons Configuration object. May be empty, but never null.

      • asMap

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> asMap()
        Converts the contents of this configuration into a regular java.util.Map.

        The returned map will receive a copy of the internal values, therefore any modifications to the returned map will have no impact on the internal state, and vice versa.

        Returns:
        This configuration, converted into a regular map. May be empty, but never null.
